name: Bohemia
startIntroPart1: Kingdom of Bohemia, core part of Lands of the Bohemian crown. After ruling Přemyslid dynasty died out, whole country went in chaos, while new Luxembourgish king John was not caring much about country. Who will make the country rise back to its glory?
startIntroPart2: Great Charles IV. your kingom is devastated, will you be able to make it shine with pride and wealth?
declaringWar: Let us serve a fair match.
attacked: Oh well, I am calling the knights of Blaník.
defeated: May you reign over the kingdom, but the God's last court will sort this out.
introduction: Are you coming to trade or to pillage?
neutralHello: May the saint Wenceslas bless you.
tradeRequest: What are you offering for this bit of our wealth?
